body_html:
What do you mean multiple backends? We plan to have a generic subgraph optimization framework which supports multiple backend, if this is what you were asking about.

@yinghai Yes, I meant whether the design can support multiple backend HW devices. You already provided the answer. Thanks.

body:
> What do you mean multiple backends? We plan to have a generic subgraph optimization framework which supports multiple backend, if this is what you were asking about.

@yinghai Yes, I meant whether the design can support multiple backend HW devices. You already provided the answer. Thanks.
